home.subtitle: Learn about food while having fun!
home.challenge_text: Earn 10 points by trying a vegetable you've never had before!

voice_bot.title: EatXP Voice Assistant
voice_bot.help_text: Ask me anything about food, recipes, or nutrition!

teen_features.missions_desc: Complete tasks to power up your character

voice_responses.apple: Apples are full of fiber and vitamin C! They help keep your teeth healthy and give you energy.
voice_responses.banana: Bananas have potassium which helps your muscles and heart! They're also great for energy.
voice_responses.carrot: Carrots have beta-carotene which is great for your eyes! Orange veggies are super healthy.
voice_responses.broccoli: Broccoli is full of vitamins and minerals! It helps your bones grow strong.
voice_responses.spinach: Spinach is packed with iron and vitamins! It makes you strong like Popeye!
voice_responses.milk: Milk has calcium which builds strong bones and teeth! Great for growing kids.
voice_responses.egg: Eggs have protein and choline which help your brain grow! Perfect for breakfast.
voice_responses.fish: Fish has omega-3s which are great for your brain! It helps you think better.
voice_responses.water: Water is super important! It keeps your body cool and helps everything work right.
voice_responses.salad: Salads have lots of veggies with vitamins and minerals! Eating colorful food is healthy.
voice_responses.recipe: I can teach you delicious recipes! Ask me about pizza, pasta, cookies, or any food you like!
voice_responses.cook: Cooking is fun and helps you learn! What food would you like to cook?
voice_responses.healthy: Eating healthy means lots of fruits, veggies, whole grains, and water! It helps your body grow strong.
voice_responses.exercise: Exercise is fun and keeps your body healthy! You can run, dance, swim, or play!
voice_responses.food: Food gives your body energy and helps you grow! Eat lots of colors - veggies, fruits, proteins!
voice_responses.sugar: Sugar gives quick energy but too much isn't good for teeth! Eat sweets in small amounts.
voice_responses.chocolate: Chocolate has some good stuff but also sugar! Have it as a treat, not every day.
voice_responses.pizza: Pizza can be healthy! Use whole wheat crust and lots of veggie toppings!

food_info.carrot_fact: Carrots were first purple, not orange!
food_info.apple_fact: Apples are part of the rose family!

story.chapter_1_narrative: Welcome to Anime Eats Academy! Your food journey starts here. Learn how different foods give your body superpowers!
story.lesson_content: Every food has special powers! Proteins build muscles üí™, Carbs give energy ‚ö°, Fats help your brain üß†, Vitamins keep you healthy üåü
